text:
"Used to Love You" is a song recorded by American singer Gwen Stefani for her third studio album, "This Is What the Truth Feels Like" (2016). It was written by Stefani, Justin Tranter, Julia Michaels, Jonathan "J.R." Rotem and Teal Douville, and produced by Rotem.
Credits and personnel.
Recorded at Westlake Studios, Los Angeles, California
Credits adapted from the liner notes of "This Is What the Truth Feels Like".
